snippet: The supersonic missile, which was set off during a training exercise, hit a fishing boat, killing its captain and injuring three crew members....
abstract: Taiwan Navy officials say patrol ship Chin Chiang accidentally fired missile during training exercise that killed Taiwanese captain of fishing boat and injured three crew members.
lead_paragraph: The supersonic missile, which was set off during a training exercise, hit a fishing boat, killing its captain and injuring three crew members.

headline.main: Taiwan Navy Accidentally Fires Antiship Missile, Killing Fisherman
headline.print_headline: Taiwan’s Navy Kills Fisherman With Missile in Training Accident
